thread.title: Rebekah Trock
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Rebekah Trock

author: Rebekah Trock
title: Rebekah Trock
text:
I absolutely LOVE thriftbooks!!! I live in an area where it's an hour or 2 hours drive in order to get to the nearest book store or even used book store. I think it's wonderful that I can simply go on this site, type in my title or author, build a wish list and order when I am ready. It's great that shipping is free after $10 has been spent- we all know how heavy books can be and therefore very expensive to ship. AND we get a $5 off coupon after spending a certain amount?! Seriously-- what's not to love here???
For avid readers such as myself, who live in a rural community, limited library hours and limited shopping opportunities, this site is a veritable god send- THANK YOU!!!
